page.title: 11TOURISM SURVEY RESULTS.
page.content: {QUESTION 1. 35% of visitors came because of the history of the village. 40% were on holiday in the area. 25% came for other reasons. {QUESTION 2. 55% came from the immediate area,thst is South Yorkshire,Manchester, Derbyshire and Nottinghamshire. 30% came from other areas of the British Isles. 15% came from abroad. {QUESTION 3 20% came by coach. 10% came on foot 70% came by motor-car. {QUESTION 4 .65% were making their first visit. 35% were coming on a return visit. {QUESTION 5. 50% yes because of the countryside. 50% no-too few amenities.
